title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          SITES IN AND AROUND MANHATTAN         Our National Parks in Manhattan and Westchester are open during every season. Check with the individual parks for special events or for any closures.    Operating Hours For: African Burial Ground | Castle Clinton | Federal Hall | Lower East Side Tenement Museum | Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace | General Grant | Hamilton Grange | St. Paul's Church          GOVERNORS ISLAND NATIONAL MONUMENT        Governors Island is open during the summer season. Ferry service departs from lower Manhattan at the Battery Maritime Building, adjacent to the Staten Island Ferry and from Brooklyn at Pier 6 located at the foot of Atlantic Avenue. Please check the Governors Island website for ferry schedules and operating days.   Operating Hours For: Governors Island National Monument           STATUE OF LIBERTY NATIONAL MONUMENT (INCLUDING ELLIS ISLAND)       The Statue of Liberty is located on Liberty Island. The Immigration Museum is located on Ellis Island. These two separate islands are accessible by the same ferry. Both islands are open every day of the year except December 25. Please check the Statue of Liberty website for the ferry operating schedule.   Operating Hours For: Statue of Liberty National Monument & Ellis Island           GATEWAY NATIONAL RECREATION AREA       Gateway National Recreation Area consists of three units. All units are open during every season. Check with the individual sites for special events or for any closures.   Operating Hours For: Jamaica Bay Unit | Staten Island Unit | Sandy Hook Unit
